definitions.body: cease, come to an end Ex 9:29, Ex 9:33, Ex 9:34 (J), Is 24:8; impers. [[חָדַל לִהְיוֹת לְשָׂרָה]] Ge 18:11 (J); cease to be De 15:11 (sq. [[מִן]]), and poet. Ju Jdg 5:6, Jdg 5:7, Jdg 5:7, 1Sa 2:5, Job 14:7; = be lacking, fail Job 19:14, Pr 10:19.

cease, leave off, sq. inf. c. [[לְ]] Ge 11:8 (J), Ge 41:49 (E), Nu 9:13 (P), 1Sa 12:23, 1Sa 23:13, Je 44:18, Je 51:30, De 23:23, Ps 36:4, Pr 19:27, Ru 1:18; inf. alone Is 1:16; so also Ho 8:10, where read [[וְחָֽדְלוּ]] for [[וַיׇּחֵלּוּ]] LXX Che We; sq. inf. c. [[מִן]] Ex 23:5 (JE), 1Ki 15:21 = 2Ch 16:5; sq. subst. c. [[מִן]] (cease regarding) Is 2:22 (but Che Du al. treat v. as interpol.; om. LXX), 1Sa 9:5, Pr 23:4; sq. [[מֵאלהים]] 2Ch 35:21, i.e. leave off provoking God; Ex 14:12 (J), sq. [[מִמֶּנּו]] desist from us, let us alone; Job 7:16; sq. acc. Job 3:17 [[רׂגֶז]] ´[[ח]]; Job 14:6 have rest (i.e. cease from being troubled, see Di; cf. v:Job 14:1); no complem. expressed, cease, forbear Ju Jdg 15:7, Jdg 20:28, Am 7:5, 1Ki 22:6, 1Ki 22:15 = 2Ch 18:5, 2Ch 18:14, Je 40:4, Je 41:8, Zec 11:12, Ps 49:9, Job 16:6, 2Ch 25:16; specif. of refusal to hear Ez Eze 2:5, Eze 2:7, Eze 3:11, Eze 3:27 (all opp. [[שָׁמַע]]).

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pf. (contracted) c. interrog. part. [[הֶחֳדַלְתִּי]] Ju Jdg 9:9, Jdg 9:11, Jdg 9:13 should I be made to leave, sq. acc. (cf. Kö:i, 240 ff.); but perh. rd. [[הֶחָדַלְתִּי]],

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. Stu Be, cf., for acc. sq., Job 3:17.
